_xResult.title: White Cocktail Skater Dress
_xResult.longdesc:
TAVROVSKA stuns again. Wear as party, modest bridesmaid or elegant office dress. Seasons: autumn, winter, spring. Dazzling white and perfect fit.

  • Premium italian fabric
  • Extraordinary high neckline (stand mandarin collar)
  • Flared (skater) skirt with inverted front pleats
  • Elegant cuffs on the long sleeves
  • Above the knee length (mini) unless otherwise specified
  • Fit and flare silhouette
  • Hidden zipper on the back

Fiber: viscose - 60%, elastan - 5%, polyester – 35% 

If you wish to customize length, please include instructions below. Measure from shoulder to bottom of desired length, and natural waist to desired length.
